channel.title: Uci on DevRa
channel.description: Recent content in Uci on DevRa

item.title: Run JupyterLab on OpenGPU Cluster with SLURM at UCI
item.description: As a graduate student in UCI’s IN4MATIX program, exploring the resources available on the Donald Bren School Computing Support page (wiki.ics.uci.edu) is truly fascinating. While most of the documentation is quite clear, I noticed that there is a lack of detailed guidance on utilizing the OpenGPU cluster. In this guide, I will provide you with a comprehensive walkthrough to help you effectively harness the power of the GPUs.
